{"step_by_step_thinking": "Pont's analysis is used to determine the size of the dental arches. Peck and Peck analysis is used to identify unique tooth characteristics. Carey's analysis is used to determine the growth pattern of the face. Bolton's analysis, on the other hand, is used to determine the optimal tooth size ratio between the maxillary and mandibular teeth.", "answer_choice": "B. Bolton's analysis"}
